node_2: horror film adaptation of the fantasy island television series
edge: The horror film adaptation of the Fantasy Island television series is being developed at Blumhouse Productions and Sony Pictures.
The development of the horror film adaptation of the Fantasy Island television series is described as 'a mix of Westworld and The Cabin in the Woods'.
